description:
The Gokudols must share the theater stage with an actual high school girl after Boss Inugane allows her to join the idol unit as their understudy.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Nirvana / Taisetsu na Mono / Oya no Oshie / Oomono Rookie / Joshikousei / Senpai Kouhai
ニルヴァーナ / 大切なもの / 親の教え / 大物ルーキー / 女子高生 / 先輩後輩
